problem_cannot_turn_on_aircraft.name: Cannot turn on aircraft
problem_cannot_turn_on_aircraft.name_spanish: No se puede encender la aeronave

problema_cannot_link_to_aircraft.name: Cannot link to aircraft
problema_cannot_link_to_aircraft.name_spanish: No se puede vincular a la aeronave

problem_rth_mission_end.name: Aircraft does not execute RTH at mission end (despite being programmed to do so)
problem_rth_mission_end.name_spanish: El dron no ejecuta el RPO al finalizar la misión (a pesar de estar programado para hacerlo).

problem_rth_tank_empty.name: Aircraft does not execute RTH when tank is empty (despite being programmed to do so)
problem_rth_tank_empty.name_spanish: El dron no ejecuta el RPO al acabar el líquido del tanque (a pesar de estar programado para hacerlo).

problem_rth_low_battery.name: Aircraft does not execute RTH at low battery (despite being programmed to do so)
problem_rth_low_battery.name_spanish: El dron no ejecuta el RPO al llegar al nivel de batería baja (a pesar de estar programado para hacerlo).

problem_aircraft_flight_unstable.name: Aircraft flight is unstable
problem_aircraft_flight_unstable.name_spanish: El vuelo de la aeronave es inestable

problem_incorrect_spray_tank_volume.name: Incorrect spray tank volume
problem_incorrect_spray_tank_volume.name_spanish: Volumen incorrecto del tanque de rociado

problem_calibration_result_pump_(PUMP)_f.name: Calibration result pump (SAME[PUMP]) fail
problem_calibration_result_pump_(PUMP)_f.name_spanish: Resultado de calibración de la bomba (SAME[PUMP]) fallido

problem_calibration_result_flow_meter_fa.name: Calibration result flow meter fail
problem_calibration_result_flow_meter_fa.name_spanish: Resultado de calibración del caudímetro fallido

problem_flow_meter_zero_pumps_running.name: Flow meter displays zero liters per minute even though the pumps are running
problem_flow_meter_zero_pumps_running.name_spanish: El caudímetro marca cero litros por minuto a pesar de que las bombas estan funcionando

problem_flow_meter_exceeds_12_liters_per.name: Flow meter exceeds 12 liters per minute
problem_flow_meter_exceeds_12_liters_per.name_spanish: El caudímetro marca más de 12 litros por minuto

problem_load_capacity_exceeded.name: Load capacity exceeded error is displayed even though the load is less than 40 liters
problem_load_capacity_exceeded.name_spanish: El error de capacidad de carga aparece muestra a pesar de que la carga se encuentra por debajo de 40 litros
